title: Bug 124777: Setting a blank tooltip in chart title causes an exception during preview.
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title and the chart is previewed, an exception occurs. The exception dialog pops up unexpectedly.
EB: When the chart is previewed in the viewer and the mouse is moved over the chart title, nothing should happen. No exception dialog should be displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a blank tooltip in the chart title. 2. Preview the chart in the viewer. 3. Move the mouse over the chart title and observe the unexpected exception dialog.
